Html:
Building on my thoughts about RibbonCommand forwarding to an existing ICommand here:

I think what I might like to do is create a RibbonDelegateCommand<T>, that derives from the Prism DelegateCommand<T>. AFAICT from the source code I would at least lose ToolTip functionality, and probably a lot more.

Would it be possible to modify future versions of the Ribbon to use an IRibbonCommand interface (that derived from ICommand)? That way I could create my own command implementation that wasn't a RoutedCommand.

I presume the licence for the current CTP prevents me modifying the code and shipping the modified version, right? Otherwise I'll try making the modification myself.

Hi swythan,

Thanks for your comments about RibbonCommand.  We'll take this feedback into account when finalizing our design. 

As you guessed, the CTP license does prevent you from modifying and shipping source code.  Thanks for checking with us on that.

Samantha
